data.prayer: Father, please raise up new apostles to pioneer the growth of the church in Solapur.
data.verse: So Christ himself gave the apostles, the prophets, the evangelists, the pastors and teachers, to equip his people for works of service, so that the body of Christ may be built up

data.location_label: Photo from the county of Solapur, Maharashtra, India
data.section_summary: What beauty can God be thanked for in this photo?

data.prayer: Father, please give the people in the county of Solapur access to a Bible in their own language.

data.section_summary: On average, 9 babies will be born in the next hour to families who are far from God in Solapur, Maharashtra, India.
data.prayer: Father, reveal yourself to these new families.
Oh Lord, show the fatherless in the county of Solapur that you can be their real Father.
data.verse: I will be to you a Father. you will be to me sons and daughters,’ says the Lord Almighty.

data.prayer: Lord we pray you unite the 47,496 believers to pray at all times in the Spirit, with all prayer and supplication, for spiritual breakthrough in Solapur.
data.verse: in every situation, by prayer and petition, with thanksgiving, present your requests to God.

data.prayer: Lord we ask you on behalf of the Bania Pancham people. 0.0% are known to be believers. Oh God, please share with them the great gift of your son Jesus and your kingdom.
Father, thank you that in your kindness you have made every believer in Solapur, Maharashtra, India a priest, who can offer spiritual sacrifices to you through Jesus.
data.verse: Therefore I tell you that the kingdom of God will be taken away from you and given to a people who will produce its fruit. He who falls on this stone will be broken to pieces, but he on whom it falls will be crushed.”

data.prayer: Spirit, fill the 47,496 believers in the county of Solapur with tears, because God is not obeyed by those around them.
data.verse: Streams of tears flow from my eyes, for your law is not obeyed.

data.prayer: Lord, you already know the names of the prophets you want to raise up in Solapur. Please, raise them up and give them the courage to speak your truth to your church.
data.verse: Before I formed you in the womb I knew you, and before you were born I consecrated you; I appointed you a prophet to the nations.
